mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.dianying_id as dianyingId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.dianying_collection_types as dianyingCollectionTypes ,a.pingfen_number as pingfenNumber ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,dianying.dianying_uuid_number as dianyingUuidNumber ,dianying.dianying_name as dianyingName ,dianying.dianying_types as dianyingTypes ,dianying.dianying_photo as dianyingPhoto ,dianying.dianying_video as dianyingVideo ,dianying.dianying_danyan as dianyingDanyan ,dianying.dianying_bianju as dianyingBianju ,dianying.dianying_address as dianyingAddress ,dianying.dianying_yuyan as dianyingYuyan ,dianying.dianying_shijian as dianyingShijian ,dianying.dianying_pianchang as dianyingPianchang ,dianying.dianying_content as dianyingContent ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail ,yonghu.yonghu_delete as yonghuDelete
FROM dianying_collection a left JOIN dianying dianying ON a.dianying_id = dianying.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.dianying_id = #{params.dianyingId} )
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.dianying_collection_types = #{params.dianyingCollectionTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.dianying_id IS NOT NULL
and dianying.dianying_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.dianyingUuidNumber},'%')
and dianying.dianying_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.dianyingName},'%')
and dianying.dianying_types = #{params.dianyingTypes}
and dianying.dianying_video like CONCAT('%',#{params.dianyingVideo},'%')
and dianying.dianying_danyan like CONCAT('%',#{params.dianyingDanyan},'%')
and dianying.dianying_bianju like CONCAT('%',#{params.dianyingBianju},'%')
and dianying.dianying_address like CONCAT('%',#{params.dianyingAddress},'%')
and dianying.dianying_yuyan like CONCAT('%',#{params.dianyingYuyan},'%')
and dianying.dianying_shijian like CONCAT('%',#{params.dianyingShijian},'%')
and dianying.dianying_pianchang like CONCAT('%',#{params.dianyingPianchang},'%')
and dianying.dianying_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.dianyingContent},'%')
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_delete >= #{params.yonghuDeleteStart}
and yonghu.yonghu_delete <= #{params.yonghuDeleteEnd}
and yonghu.yonghu_delete = #{params.yonghuDelete}
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
